air:FareRule.air:FareRuleLong: RULE - 008/SCS1 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE SCG1 IN IPRG APPLIES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED FARES WITHIN AREA 3 APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN AREA 3. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR FIRST/BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE SCG1 IN IPRG APPLIES BETWEEN CHINA AND BANGLADESH FOR LOW/OFF-PEAK SEASON FARES PERMITTED 30NOV 21 THROUGH 31DEC 21 OR 01JAN 22 THROUGH 13JAN 22 OR 31JAN 22 THROUGH 18FEB 22 OR 02MAR 22 THROUGH 29MAR 22 OR 01MAY 22 THROUGH 09JUL 22 OR 01NOV 22 THROUGH 31DEC 22 OR 01JAN 23 THROUGH 10JAN 23 OR 20JAN 23 THROUGH 20AUG 23 OR 11SEP 23 THROUGH 04OCT 23 OR 08OCT 23 THROUGH 31DEC 23 OR 01JAN 24 THROUGH 29JAN 24 OR 18JUN 24 THROUGH 04OCT 24 OR 08OCT 24 THROUGH 31DEC 24 OR 01JAN 25 THROUGH 07JAN 25 OR 28JAN 25 THROUGH 20AUG 25 OR 11SEP 25 THROUGH 04OCT 25 OR 08OCT 25 THROUGH 31DEC 25 ON THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL SECTOR.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE SCG1 IN IPRG APPLIES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING TG FLIGHTS 3000 THROUGH 7999 9W FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 7999 SQ FLIGHTS 1000 THROUGH 9999 MI FLIGHTS 1000 THROUGH 9999 AI FLIGHTS 3000 THROUGH 8999 PG FLIGHTS 3300 THROUGH 3399 PG FLIGHTS 3500 THROUGH 3699 PG FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 4999 PG FLIGHTS 6101 THROUGH 6999 PG FLIGHTS 8000 THROUGH 9999 BI FLIGHTS 3000 THROUGH 3999 GA FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9099 GA FLIGHTS 9909 THROUGH 9999 UL FLIGHTS 2000 THROUGH 2999 VN FLIGHTS 2000 THROUGH 5999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST INCLUDE TRAVEL BETWEEN INTERNATIONAL SECTORS IN CHINA AND AREA 3 ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY MU ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY FM ANY FM FLIGHT OPERATED BY FM ANY FM FLIGHT OPERATED BY MU. AND IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN AREA 3 THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY TG FLIGHT OPERATED BY TG ANY 9W FLIGHT OPERATED BY 9W ANY SQ FLIGHT OPERATED BY SQ ANY MI FLIGHT OPERATED BY MI ANY AI FLIGHT OPERATED BY AI ANY PG FLIGHT OPERATED BY PG ANY CX FLIGHT OPERATED BY CX ANY KA FLIGHT OPERATED BY KA ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY MU ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY FM ANY FM FLIGHT OPERATED BY FM ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY KN ANY RA FLIGHT OPERATED BY RA ANY BI FLIGHT OPERATED BY BI ANY GA FLIGHT OPERATED BY GA ANY HX FLIGHT OPERATED BY HX ANY UO FLIGHT OPERATED BY UO ANY PR FLIGHT OPERATED BY PR ANY UL FLIGHT OPERATED BY UL ANY VN FLIGHT OPERATED BY VN ANY S2 FLIGHT OPERATED BY S2 ANY 3K FLIGHT OPERATED BY 3K ANY BL FLIGHT OPERATED BY BL ANY VF FLIGHT OPERATED BY VF. AND IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN THAILAND THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY TG FLIGHT OPERATED BY TG ANY PG FLIGHT OPERATED BY PG. AND IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN VIETNAM THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY VN FLIGHT OPERATED BY VN. AND IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN INDIA THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY AI FLIGHT OPERATED BY AI ANY S2 FLIGHT OPERATED BY S2. AND IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN CHINA THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY MU ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY FM ANY FM FLIGHT OPERATED BY FM ANY FM FLIGHT OPERATED BY MU ANY MU FLIGHT OPERATED BY KN ANY FM FLIGHT OPERATED BY KN. NOTE - IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN CHINA ON/BEFORE 24OCT20 BOOKING MU FLIGHTS MU6001 THROUGH MU6199 OR MU6500 THROUGH MU6599 OR MU6700 THROUGH MU6799 OR MU6001G THROUGH 6199G OR MU6500G THROUGH MU6599G OR MU6700G THROUGH MU6799G OR MU6001B THROUGH MU6199B OR MU6500B THROUGH MU6599B OR MU6700B THROUGH MU6799B THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE BY TRAIN OR BY BUS. RELATED RULES AND OPERATIONS OF RAILWAY TICKETS OR BUS TICKETS CAN BE CONSULTED ON WWW.CEAIR.COM OR WITH CALLCENTER 95530. IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN CHINA ON/AFTER 25OCT20 BOOKING MU FLIGHTS MU1000 THROUGH MU1399 THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE BY TRAIN OR BY BUS. RELATED RULES AND OPERATIONS OF RAILWAY TICKETS OR BUS TICKETS CAN BE CONSULTED ON WWW.CEAIR.COM OR WITH CALLCENTER 95530.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE SCG1 IN IPRG APPLIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE SCG1 IN IPRG APPLIES
FOR ROUND TRIP FARES TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 3 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE GG01 IN IPRG APPLIES FOR I- TYPE FARES 4 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH DIRECTION LIMITED TO 2 AT CNY 1200 EACH AND 2 AT CNY 1200 EACH. 1 IN EACH DIRECTION AT CNY 1200 EACH 1 IN EACH DIRECTION AT CNY 1200 EACH. A STOPOVER MAY NOT EXCEED 7 DAYS.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED NOTE - RULE SCG1 IN IPRG APPLIES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT FARE BREAK SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

FOR I- TYPE FARES CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED. APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF COMBINATION. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. END-ON-END NOTE - SIDE TRIP COMBINATIONS PERMITTED OPEN JAWS OUTBOUND FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS. A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. MILEAGE OF THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN MILEAGE OF THE LONGEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. PROVIDED - THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE -BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST/BETWEEN EUROPE AND AFRICA/BETWEEN TAIWAN, PROVINCE OF AND JAPAN/KOREA, REP. OF/KOREA, DEM. PEOPLE'S REP.
